name: 施議訓
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。品質管制之基本觀念、應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質、管制圖、抽樣原理、品質成本、品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
本課程講述瞭解品質管理之理論。本課程之目的在使學生能建立品質管理基本知識，可進一步將研究中所觀察之品質管理行為與理論機制加以結合。
This course introduces the Quality Management Principle. The objective of this course is to establish the fundamental knowledge of Quality Management for the students and to further connect the observed Quality Management behavior to the theoretical mechanisms in researches. 
本標準所規定的要求是通用的，以期適用於各種類型、不同規模和提供不同產品的所有組織。
All requirements of this International Standard are generic and are intended to be applicable to all organizations, regardless of type, size and product provided.

 本文介紹了修訂版ISO9000:2008質量管理體系標準所依據的八大管理原則。 這些原則可以作為一個框架，指導高級管理者改進組織的績效。 這些原則來源於參與ISO技術委員會ISO/TC176質量管理和質量保證的國際專家組的集體經驗和知識。 技術委員會負責ISO9000標準的開發和維護。 
This documentintroduces the eight quality management principles on which the quality management system standards of the revised ISO 9000:2008 series are based. These principles can be used by senior management as a framework to guide their organizations towards improved performance. The principles are derived from the collective experience and knowledge of the international experts who participate in ISO Technical Committee ISO/TC 176, Quality management and quality assurance, which is responsible for developing and maintaining the ISO 9000 standards.
